section.title: Examples
section.description: The example below reverses an array of numbers.
section.example:
dim p[3] as n p[1] = 1 p[2] = 2 p[3] = 3
reverseArray(p)
?p.dump() = 3 2 1

section.description: The example below reverses an array of character strings.
section.example:
dim p[2] as p p[1].name = "alpha" p[2].name = "beta"
reverseArray(p)
?p.dump_properties("name") = "beta" "alpha"
